name: Shortcode Magic
author: 678 Studios

sections.description:
A nice and very simple plugin full of amazing shortcodes to use. No coding knowledge required.

A full list of shortcodes can be found on our Github Wiki page, or in the admin panel. I (i678) orignally made this as a hobby, and decided to release it to the public. If there are any issues, you may report it on the issues tab of the Github repo.

Features:

  • Nice Shortcodes

  • A nicely designed Admin Panel
sections.installation:
1. Upload the file at wp-content/plugins/
  2. Activate the plugin in your admin panel
  3. Done!
sections.faq:
Can I donate?

We do not accept donations currently, apolgies.
sections.changelog:
1.5.1

  • MAJOR bug fix – it is STRONGLY recommended you upgrade!!

1.5

  • A lot of changes – many shortcodes will break with this update
  • Admin panel return

1.4.1

  • Major organization of code
  • Add even more shortcodes

1.4

  • Add 4 shortcodes
  • Fix readme.txt
  • Publish on wordpress.org plugins directory
